Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides that lactation rooms in service areas which are maintained or operated by the New York state thruway authority shall display information for services related to human trafficking
Summary: Provides that lactation rooms in service areas which are maintained or operated by the New York state thruway authority shall display information for services related to human trafficking.
LawCode: Amd ยง389, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to information concerning services for human trafficking victims in certain facilities at service areas
